attributes.action: Honour the memory of Henry Allingham by placing his remains at the Cenotaph, Whitehall
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the sad death of this wonderful, heroic, and humble individual, I request that the Governemnt & the Royal Family consider an approach to Mr Allingham's family to bury him at the Cenotaph in Whitehall, so from that day onwards we have a "Tomb of the Known Soldier" to honour the memory of this truly Great Briton.

rejection.details: Arrangements for Mr Allingham's remains are a private matter for his family.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
